001package com.deploygate.sdk.internal;
002
003import android.app.Activity;
004import android.app.Application;
005import android.os.Build;
006import android.os.Bundle;
007import android.os.SystemClock;
008
009import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
010
011public final class VisibilityLifecycleCallbacks implements Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks {
012    public interface OnVisibilityChangeListener {
013        void onForeground(
014                long elapsedRealtime,
015                TimeUnit timeUnit
016        );
017
018        void onBackground(
019                long elapsedRealtime,
020                TimeUnit timeUnit
021        );
022    }
023
024    private int onResumeCount = 0; // this is manipulated from the single thread
025
026    private final OnVisibilityChangeListener listener;
027
028    public VisibilityLifecycleCallbacks(OnVisibilityChangeListener listener) {
029        this.listener = listener;
030    }
031
032    @Override
033    public void onActivityCreated(
034            Activity activity,
035            Bundle savedInstanceState
036    ) {
037        // no-op
038    }
039
040    @Override
041    public void onActivityStarted(Activity activity) {
042        // no-op
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public void onActivityResumed(Activity activity) {
047        onResumeCount++;
048
049        if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.JELLY_BEAN_MR1) {
050            listener.onForeground(SystemClock.elapsedRealtimeNanos(), TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS);
051        } else {
052            listener.onForeground(SystemClock.elapsedRealtime(), TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
053        }
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public void onActivityPaused(Activity activity) {
058        onResumeCount = Math.max(onResumeCount - 1, 0); // cuz uint is unavailable.
059
060        if (onResumeCount == 0) {
061            if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.JELLY_BEAN_MR1) {
062                listener.onBackground(SystemClock.elapsedRealtimeNanos(), TimeUnit.NANOSECONDS);
063            } else {
064                listener.onBackground(SystemClock.elapsedRealtime(), TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
065            }
066        }
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public void onActivityStopped(Activity activity) {
071        // no-op
072    }
073
074    @Override
075    public void onActivitySaveInstanceState(
076            Activity activity,
077            Bundle outState
078    ) {
079        // no-op
080    }
081
082    @Override
083    public void onActivityDestroyed(Activity activity) {
084        // no-op
085    }
086}
